Articles.Content:
My KSP seems to have a really bad tendency to crash. It can happen randomly in-game, but most of the time it's on startup. The only mod I have installed is Kerbal Engineer. I've validated the game files, uninstalled all my mods, but nothing works...

Here is the Player.log from my last startup (crash on startup). 

 

If you need anything else just say. Thanks!

Edited November 24, 2019 by Livaco
